title: An honest(stupid) mistake
body:
I mainly play on EUW, but today i made a secound account and bought rp with it and used it, i didnt realize that i made that account on NA sever. The problem with NA is that i get high ping over there and i just cant play on NA server. My account is level 1, just made it a few hours ago, do you think riot will tansfer it to EUW for free?
I just made a stupid mistake.

replies.body: I can see that happening with having multiple accounts, and it's an honest mistake.  No worries, we'd like to take a look and see if we can find any options.  I can't make any guarantees, but reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will check out your specific issue.  It may take a few moments for a response, but we will asap!

Thanks a lot sir!
And yes, i did make a support ticket regarding my issue.
